mapper.insert: insert into homeboard (b_no, title, thumbnail, content, theme, hashtag, userid, nickname, hit, scrap, writedate, ip) values (homeboard_sq.nextval, #{title}, #{thumbnail}, #{content}, #{theme}, #{hashtag}, #{userid}, #{nickname}, 0, 0, sysdate, #{ip})
mapper.select: select b_no, userid, title, content, theme, hashtag, hit, scrap, to_char(writedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') writedate from homeboard where b_no=#{param1}
